statements: DELETE FROM customer_churn_prediction WHERE customer_id = 100 AND transaction_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM customer_churn_prediction WHERE product_purchased = 'Apparel' AND transaction_amount > 50;
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'refund' AND transaction_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 AND transaction_type = 'purchase';
DELETE FROM churn_history WHERE churned = TRUE;
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND transaction_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM churn_predictions WHERE customer_id = 10 AND prediction_date < '2022-01-01';
